entry.def: Mailing is the activity of sending things to people through the postal service.

example.ex: The newsletter was printed towards the end of June in readiness for mailing...
example.tran: 快到6月底的时候，时事通讯印刷完毕准备投寄。

example.ex: The owners of the store have stepped up customer mailings.
example.tran: 店主们加大了对顾客的邮寄宣传力度。

entry.def: A mailing is something that is sent to people through the postal service.

example.ex: The seniors organizations sent out mailings to their constituencies.
example.tran: 老年人组织向各自的会员寄送了邮件。

means.word_mean: 1. mail sent by a sender at one time;

sentences.sentence: "the candidate sent out three large mailings"
"the postmark indicates the time of mailing"
